Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.event

Class GuiElementEvents

java.lang.Object
technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.event.GuiElementEvents
public class GuiElementEvents extends Object
GuiElementEvents is a container for the GuiEventListenerLists for various event types for GuiElements.
